ing: 1 (64 ounce) bottle tomato and clam juice cocktail
des: "Mexican cold tomato soup! Refrigerate overnight and serve chilled in chilled bowls with croutons."
ins: Mix tomato and clam juice cocktail, ketchup, lemon juice, cilantro, cucumber, shrimp, imitation crabmeat, and green bell pepper in a 2-quart container. Chill 8 hours or overnight and serve in bowls topped with diced avocado and tomato.
